'''''rhî''''' is a [[Noldorin]] word meaning "crown".<ref name=LR>{{LR|Etymologies}}, p. 383</ref>

==Etymology==

Noldorin ''rhî'' is a descendant form of [[Kornoldorin|Old Noldorin]] ''ríge'', deriving from root [[RIG#Other versions|RIG]].<ref name=LR/>

==Cognates==

*[[Quenya]] ''[[rië|ríe]]''<ref name=VT>{{VT|46a}}, p. 11</ref>
*[[Noldorin]] ''[[rhîs]]'' ("queen")<ref name=LR/>

==See also==
*[[Sindarin]] ''[[rî]]''
*[[Quenya]]/[[Telerin]] ''[[ría]]''
